Exception
System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid length parameter passed to the LEFT or SUBSTRING function.
Incorrect syntax near ')'.
Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-24' AND 
	'2020-11-30' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-24' AND 
    '2020-11-30' and  Project.CompanyId =5
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInternalConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.ThrowExceptionAndWarning(TdsParserStateObject stateObj, Boolean callerHasConnectionLock, Boolean asyncClose)

Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND 
	'2020-11-04' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND

System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid length parameter passed to the LEFT or SUBSTRING function.
Incorrect syntax near ')'.
Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND 
	'2020-11-04' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30047) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND 
    '2020-11-04' and  Project.CompanyId =5
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable

Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (1,2,3,4,30007,40006,60007,70006,100019,100020,110008,110014,110017,120008) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (100008) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND 
	'2020-11-13' AND 
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (1,2,3,4,30007,40006,60007,70006,100019,100020,110008,110014,110017,120008) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (100008) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-06' AND 
    '2020-11-13'
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)

ERROR 2020-11-18 16:00:21,175 [13   ] EWebList.API.Logger                      - Application Error
Exception
System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid length parameter passed to the LEFT or SUBSTRING function.
Incorrect syntax near ')'.
Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30047,30050) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-11' AND 
	'2020-11-18' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30047,30050) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-11' AND 
    '2020-11-18' and  Project.CompanyId =5
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlInternalConnection.OnError(SqlException exception, Boolean breakConnection, Action`1 wrapCloseInAction)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.ThrowExceptionAndWarning(TdsParserStateObject stateObj, Boolean callerHasConnectionLock, Boolean asyncClose)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.TdsParser.TryRun(RunBehavior runBehavior, SqlCommand cmdHandler, SqlDataReader dataStream, BulkCopySimpleResultSet bulkCopyHandler, TdsParserStateObject stateObj, Boolean& dataReady)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.TryConsumeMetaData()
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.get_MetaData()
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.FinishExecuteReader(SqlDataReader ds, RunBehavior runBehavior, String resetOptionsString)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.RunExecuteReaderTds(CommandBehavior cmdBehavior, RunBehavior runBehavior, Boolean returnStream, Boolean async, Int32 timeout, Task& task, Boolean asyncWrite, SqlDataReader ds)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.RunExecuteReader(CommandBehavior cmdBehavior, RunBehavior runBehavior, Boolean returnStream, TaskCompletionSource`1 completion, Int32 timeout, Task& task, Boolean asyncWrite, String method)
   at System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.RunExecuteReader(CommandBehavior cmdBehavior, RunBehavior runBehavior, Boolean returnStream, String method)

   at Dapper.SqlMapper.QueryImpl[T](IDbConnection cnn, CommandDefinition command, Type effectiveType)+MoveNext() in /_/Dapper/SqlMapper.cs:line 1079

Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30047,30050) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-11' AND 
	'2020-11-18' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30047,30050) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-11' AND 
    '2020-11-18' and  Project.CompanyId =5
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable

Exception
System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid length parameter passed to the LEFT or SUBSTRING function.
Incorrect syntax near ')'.
Select * from
 (
  Select FirstName,AttandanceDate,WorkingHours,[Name],
  (
	select   
	convert(time,dateadd(s,SUM(( DATEPART(hh, WorkingHours) * 3600 ) + ( DATEPART(mi, WorkingHours) * 60 ) + DATEPART(ss, WorkingHours)),0)) As Total From Attandance  
	where 
	WorkingHours like '%:%'AND 
	UserId  IN (30046,30047,30048,30050,30055,30056,30057,30058,30059,30060) AND 
	ProjectId  IN (30020,30022,40024) AND 
	AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-13' AND 
	'2020-11-20' AND   Project.CompanyId =5 and
	atd.UserId=Attandance.UserId and
	atd.ProjectId=Attandance.ProjectId
	group by (UserId)) as Total
	from Attandance atd INNER JOIN
	[User] 
	ON 
	[User].UserId = atd.UserId
	INNER JOIN
	[Project] 
	ON 
	[Project].ProjectId = atd.ProjectId 
	where atd.UserId  IN (30046,30047,30048,30050,30055,30056,30057,30058,30059,30060) AND 
	atd.ProjectId  IN (30020,30022,40024) AND 
	atd.AttandanceDate BETWEEN  '2020-11-13' AND 
    '2020-11-20' and  Project.CompanyId =5
  ) AS BaseData 
  PIVOT(MAX(WorkingHours) FOR AttandanceDate IN()) AS PivotTable
